performance of standard neural text clas.based on: Convolutional Neural Networks (LeCun et al., 2010; Kim, 2014, CNN)

focus on the role.from sentence: In this paper we focus on the role of preprocessing the input text, particularly in how it is split into individual (meaning-bearing) tokens and how it affects the performance of standard neural text classification models based on Convolutional Neural Networks (LeCun et al., 2010; Kim, 2014, CNN).
